title: Is there a solution to the leavers in League?
body:
**[if i can get a red's opinion on this that would be fantastic]**

Hola fellow Summoners,

I think i speak for a lot of people in League when i say that having an AFK/DC on your team sucks, regardless of game mode. Having this new and improved player reform system, there should be less and less of these AFK's (and somewhat less DC's). I've got to admit however that a pretty decent number of my games have had at least one AFK/DC, which just overall takes away from the fun of the game when suddenly you find yourself and three others trying to work extra hard to make up for your missing player.

With the new system culling out all the leavers it see's, the issue of leavers appearing in games is still present. While the system may reduce to some extent the amount of leavers in games, it in no way means that there will outright be no more leavers at all. Personally i think there is an element missing from this whole process. One solution i could think of is having a system that you can opt into from the matchmaking menu that basically says *"yes i am okay with being placed in a game in session"* which will essentially let you take the place of a leaver (and announce that to everyone in game).

I know that system wouldn't be perfect but i really think this is an issue that is at least worth discussing, because currently there isn't really much being done at all for those games that *currently* have a leaver on their team. Post your opinions below!

replies.body: yeah ive thought about that, similar to counter strike, and most likely other games. you wouldnt be allowed to play with runes you dont have, judging by ritos usual logic. also this would still only encourage leaving to make it like its even less of a big deal. if they could still get instapunished like losing IP and it gets transferred to the replacement as an extra reward that would be cool, but it seems way too complicated for such a thing that riot wouldnt benefit from, financially of course....

Its a bit of a misconception that all riot cares about is money, they do need money to pay for their huge staff and *especially* with the new game they have plans on making right now. Aside from that though, it would certainly be more of a "for the players" initiative, and with all the plans Riot has right now in terms of pre-season wrap up and harrowing and Worlds... its probably not going to be something Riot will look at in the near future. BUT, hopefully someone will at least see this post to plant the thought in their head and hopefully bring it up with other rioters.
sadly i dont think they've seen it, maybe if i keep posting and keeping the thread alive theyll notice it aha
